articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with WPK Cell Secretaries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with WPK Cell Secretaries
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un had a photo session with the participants in the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Worker's Party of Korea (WPK).
					 When Kim Jong Un appeared in the venue, the participants burst into cheers of "hurrah!" and enthusiastically welcomed him.
					
					 Acknowledging the cheers of the participants, Kim Jong Un extended a warm salute to them and all other cell secretaries who have made unassuming, devoted efforts for the WPK's development and the country's prosperity with the pride and honor of being cadres of primary party units.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that the conference would be recorded in the history of the WPK as an important milestone in the drive for increasing the party's important function in every way and achieving the final victory in their efforts to build a thriving nation as required by a new era for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He had a photo taken with them, warmly congratulating them on ensuring the successful conference with high zeal and active participation.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the participants in the conference and all other cell secretaries single-mindedly keeping to the road of revolution under the leadership of the party would fulfill the revolutionary duties they assumed in the holy struggle to bring earlier the future of the prosperity, firmly united around the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 Present at the photo session were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ri Pyong Sam and Jo Yon Jun.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to President of AU
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to President of AU
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Ethiopian Prime Minister Haile-Mariam Dessalegn, president of the African Union.
					 Kim in the message said that the 20th ordinary session of the assembly of heads of state and government of the African Union was successfully held thanks to the sincere efforts of the Ethiopian government and people and congratulated the prime minister upon his election as the president of AU with the support and approval of the participants in the session.
					
					 Kim said that the session marked a significant occasion that demonstrated once again the efforts of the African countries to accelerate the process of continental integration as required by the developing era and reality and meet regional and world-wide challenges.
					
					 He reiterated the DPRK's stand to steadily consolidate and develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the African countries and wished AU greater progress in its work for the unity and development, peace and prosperity of the African continent.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Double Standards over Satellite Launch Issue
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Double Standards over Satellite Launch Issue 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Saturday as regards the fact that U.S. revealed the double standards and brigandish nature by denying the DPRK the right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes:
					 The U.S., which masterminded the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK's launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, supported and defended south Korea's launch of satellite Naro, drawing worldwide censure and derision.
					
					 A spokesman for the U.S. State Department made sophism that south Korea has carried out space launch program in a responsible manner and clarified that it is not for military purposes, adding that south Korea's approach is, therefore, quite different from north Korea's.
					
					 The U.S. denied the DPRK's right to launch satellite for no justifiable reason but blindly connived at the satellite launch by its stooge south Korea. This is the height of double standards and impudence.
					
					 The successful launch of Kwangmyongsong 3-2 by the DPRK was the exercise of the legitimate right of a sovereignty state consistent with universally recognized international law. Even professional institutions in the U.S., to say nothing of the international community, admitted that the DPRK's satellite goes around its orbit. 
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. perpetrated the highhanded hostile act of deliberately negating the DPRK's independent and legitimate right to satellite launch. This goes to prove that from the outset it intended to use the satellite launch as a new occasion of stifling the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. was wrong in seeking the adoption of UNSC "resolutions" which it cites whenever an opportunity presents itself to use as a pretext for denying the DPRK's right to satellite launch. It forced the UNSC to enforce the hostile policy in a bid to block the DPRK's scientific research into space and its economic development, trampling upon the universally accepted international law reflecting the general will of the international community in violation of the fundamental principles of the UN Charter which calls for respecting each country's sovereignty and ensuring impartiality.
					
					 Last year when it left no means untried to stifle the DPRK the U.S. allowed the south Korean puppets to drastically extend the range of missiles in violation of the missile non-proliferation regime cooked up by itself, straining the regional situation.
					
					 Still overlooked is the brigandish logic that its stooges are allowed to do whatever they like and those countries hostile to it are not allowed to do anything and the law governing existence based on jungle law prevails. It is the situation of the present world. 
					
					 The American way of thinking, American standard may work on other countries but never on the DPRK. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have launched an all-out struggle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The U.S. brazen-faced double standards and highhanded hostile act are bound to face the DPRK's toughest retaliation.

articles.title: DPRK Will Retaliate against Provokers: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
DPRK Will Retaliate against Provokers: CPRK Secretariat
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued information bulletin No. 1019 Saturday.
					 It said:
					
					 The puppet group of south Korea, much upset by the strong statement of the DPRK in reaction to the hostile measures taken at the UN, is working hard to take part in the "sanctions" in league with the U.S. just like a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 At an emergency meeting of ministers for diplomacy and security on January 31, traitor Lee, speaking loudly of the "north's nuclear test and additional provocation and threats", made provocative remarks calling for "tighter sanctions" and "counteraction". Puppet Defence Minister Kim Kwan Jin, Chief of the Intelligence Service Won Se Hun and others fully backed him.
					
					 Chon Yong U, chief of Diplomacy and Security in Chongwadae, Ryu U Ik, puppet minister of Unification, and other confrontation maniacs of south Korea said that "the north should choose one, either survival or nuclear weapons" and "stronger sanctions unbearable by the north have to be imposed".
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime do not hesitate to make such outbursts as calling for not ruling out even military "sanctions". In the meantime, the U.S. ultra-modern war means are being amassed in south Korea and in the areas around the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. nuclear submarine and Aegis cruiser entered south Korea to hold combined marine exercises and to show off "military muscle" while the puppet army was put on "an alert to stand guard against the north." Warmongers are inciting war fever while touring units in the forefront areas.
					
					The south Korean puppet group of traitors, which took an active part in the adoption of the unwarranted UN "resolution" against the Koreans, are now working hard to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and provoke a war against it while calling the DPRK's counteraction for defending its inviolable sovereignty an "additional provocation". This shows that the south Korean group consists of hooligans and matchless villains to exterminate the nation in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 The Lee group's anti-DPRK confrontation racket is a last-ditch effort of a man more dead than alive. The intention of the group is to make a bluff with the help of the American master and save its tarnished image even a bit. It also seeks to drive the situation to the extremes by brandishing the ball of fire, plunge the north-south ties into an irretrievable phase and hand over the baton of "sanctions" and "confrontation" to the next regime.
					
					  The ever-more intensified confrontation racket on the part of the U.S., the Lee group and other hostile forces goes to prove that the UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is a product of the deliberate and planned intrigues to escalate the hostile steps against it to bar it from building an economic giant, and to isolate and stifle it. But they are seriously mistaken.
					
					 The "sanctions" of the enemies further hardened the will and strength of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to defend their just cause and build the most powerful nation, a highly-civilized socialist nation under the banner of justice.
					
					 The Lee group talks about "sanctions" in league with the U.S. and Japan. This reminds one of a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger as it is a suicidal act of jumping into fire with fagot.
					
					 The DPRK already declared its toughest stand to cope with the hostile steps of the ferocious enemies, and its army and people are fully ready and waiting for only the time for final battle. 
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready for both economic and military "sanctions", and anyone who encroaches upon its dignity and sovereignty even a bit with any form of "sanctions" will not be able to avoid deadly retaliation.
					
					 The Lee group should bear in mind that its participation in the "sanctions" against the DPRK will lead to a historical grand war for national reunification.
					
					 Invincible is our just cause and no force on earth can arrest it.
					
					 The Lee group should stop a foolish act, understanding the fierce nature of the history of stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S.

articles.title: Workshop Held for Participants of Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK
articles.content:
Workshop Held for Participants of Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A workshop for the participants of the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place here from January 29 to February 1.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, and members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, secretaries and other officials of the C.C., the WPK and the participants of the conference.
					
					 The workshop dealt with tasks and ways facing the party cells in fully playing their roles as vanguard for devotedly defending the leader and carrying out his intentions, and as basic units linking the ties of blood between the Party and masses in hearty response to the important tasks set forth in the historic speech made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the conference.
					
					 The immortal party building exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were more deeply instilled into party cell secretaries. Stressed at the workshop was the importance of the duty of the party cells in strengthening the Party organizationally and ideologically. The participants were also brought to the knowledge of the achievements in the party cell work and among cell secretaries, and measures were taken to generalize the experience and overcome deviations.
					
					 The main content of "Let Us Enhance the Militant Might of the Party in Every Way and Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Improving the Work of Party Cells", the important speech made by Kim Jong Un at the conference, was brought home to the participants at the workshop.
					
					 The participants were also taught that the sacred obligation and duty of the revolutionary soldiers are to sincerely hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The workshop underscored the need to glorify forever the immortal exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed for the development of the party cells, and make all the party cells vibrant organizations.
					
					 The workshop called for substantially conducting the ideological education to give fullest play to the mental power of the party members and other people, making the masses get united closer around the Party by doing well the work with them, true to the policy of Kim Jong Un for loving the people, and dynamically hastening the building of a thriving nation by embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Joint Performance Given
articles.content:
Joint Performance Given
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The joint performance "The Voice of the Mother" was given for the participants in the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) by the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus of the Korean People's Army in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 The performance began with "National Anthem". Put on the stage were chorus "International", mixed chorus and chorus "Recollection of the 20th Century", instrumental music and pangchang "Are We Living Like in Those Days", female chorus and chorus "Forever with the Leader and the Party" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by strengthening and developing the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche, powerful general staff of the Songun revolution and genuine motherly party.
					
					 Also put on the stage were songs "Fly Higher Our Party Flag" and "The People Are Single-minded" which the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made resound forth on the road of advance in the new century of Juche.
					
					 The performance was perfect in contents and style as it was music representation of fresh level thanks to unique and dynamic delineation of profound and rich emotion and melody through a good combination of Korean-style light music, orchestral music and chorus, fascinating and three dimensional stage decor and peculiar lighting, etc. It instilled into the audience pride and honor of ushering in the era of high level of civilization and efflorescence of thriving Korea.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun and Kim Yong Chun, members of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam, Jo Yon Jun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, party leading officials here and provinces and the participants of the conference.

articles.title: Participants in Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK Depart Here
articles.content:
Participants in Conference of Cell Secretaries of WPK Depart Here
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) left here on Saturday by bus or train after winding up their itinerary amid the great expectation and concern of all the party members and other people of the DPRK.
					 They were seen off by officials of the Central Committee of the WPK and officials concerned.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch Awarded State Decorations
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch Awarded State Decorations
						
Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK's scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful liftoff of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 were awarded state decorations.
					Order of Kim Jong Il went to Ri Ung Won and Kim Song and five others, Kim Jong Il Prize to Ri Song Sam, Ri Chi Sun, Ri Sang Ryul, To Nam Sop, Kim Yong Nam and 15 others and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Han Sok Gun, Kim Chol Gon, Jong Chol Min and 24 others.
					
					14 people were awarded the title of People's Scientist, 27 the title of Merited Scientist, 362 Order of National Flag First Class, 340 Order of Labor, 1 260 Order of National Flag Second Class, 2 687 Order of National Flag Third Class, 644 Medal of Merit and 395 Distinguished Military Service Medal.
					
					The decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on it was promulgated on Jan. 30.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest under Way in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The 18th Paektusan Prize Sports Contest among officials of national institutions opened in Pyongyang on January 24.
					 The contest is now going on in real earnest with growing sports enthusiasm of participants.
					
					 Kim Ki Jong, vice-director of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					 "Through the contest, its participants have fully displayed their skills and techniques trained in ordinary days.
					
					 Divided into four groups, they have competed in basketball and volleyball events on a knock-out basis.
					
					 The Ministry of Railways, the Minju Joson and the Foreign Trade Bank top the standings in basketball event.
					
					 Competitions in volleyball and Taekwon-Do events are under way at gymnasiums in Chongchun Street. The Ministry of Mining Industry and the Education Commission are expected to compete in the finals in the volleyball event.
					
					 The current sports contest drew more teams from ministries and national institutions than last year, with active participation of their leading officials."
					
					 Rim Chun Hak, an official of the Foreign Languages Publishing House, said:
					
					 "I took the individual pattern title in the Taekwon-Do event. I began to learn Taekwon-Do at the age of 15.
					
					 The contest made me feel again the advantage of the Korean traditional martial arts. Taekwon-Do is not simply a sports event. It is a pride of the Korean nation as it displays its wisdom.
					
					 I have taken part in the contest for consecutive years, and the Foreign Languages Publishing House took the titles in Taekwon-Do event several times.
					
					 I will make a contribution to honoring the fame of my institution through the contest."

articles.title: New Poster of 17th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
articles.content:
New Poster of 17th Kimjongilia Festival Produced 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A poster of the 17th Kimjongilia Festival to be held in Pyongyang with splendor on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was produced. 
					 The poster has slogan "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" written in block letter. There are letters "The Day of the Shining Star" and the logo of the festival in the upper part of the poster and the letters "The 17th Kimjongilia Festival" and the venue and period of the festival in its lower part. 
					
					 Depicted in its center are the Jong Il Peak and forest covered with snow and the Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and Kimjongilias in full bloom.

articles.title: Vol. 3 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Off Press
articles.content:
Vol. 3 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Off Press
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Vol. 3 of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" was published in the DPRK.
					 It deals with his works in chronological order.
					
					 It contains 108 works such as speeches and talks between May and December Juche 50 (1961).
					
					 Among the works are "Let Us Glorify the Cause of Our Party Forever" and "On Effectively Guiding Party Life of Party Members in Conformity with Duty of Party Cell".
					
					 These works clarify the principled issues to be held fast to in glorifying the cause of the party and developing it into a revolutionary and militant party.
					
					 The book includes "Youth and Students Are Masters Responsible for Future of Science and Technology in Our Country" and "Let Us Learn from Revolutionary Habit of Study of Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Fighters".
					
					 Those works clarify tasks and ways to bring about a radical change in the study of the students.
					
					 There are also in the book "On Solving the Theoretical Issue of Political Economy on the Basis of Our Party's Policy" and "On Some Experiences in Socialist Economic Construction in Our Country".
					
					 These works deal with the issue of thoroughly establishing Juche in scientific researches and successes and experiences gained in socialist construction under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 There are such works as those clarifying ways to implement the economic policy of the Party.
					
					 Among them are "On Giving Full Play to Advantages of Socialist Planned Economy" and "7-year Plan Is Economic Construction Programme for Stepping Up Socialist Construction".
					
					 The book contains such works as those dealing with tasks facing the youth and students and service members to play the role of a shock brigade in the efforts to realize the far-reaching plan of President Kim Il Sung to build Pyongyang into a more magnificent and beautiful city and with the issues of popularizing sports and making it part of one's life to practice sports.
					
					 It also contains works which give answers to theoretical and practical issues arising in various fields.

articles.title: Many Famous Works Created in DPRK for Ten Years
articles.content:
Many Famous Works Created in DPRK for Ten Years
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il in his famous work "Journalists and Writers Should Be Songun Revolutionary Fighters Holding the Party with Pen of Revolution" on Feb. 3, Juche 92 (2003) clarified the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching importance to media and set forth the revolutionary policy on bringing about a great turn in media and literary and art activities.
					 Journalists and writers of the DPRK, bearing in mind the deep trust and expectation of the WPK, have created many famous works for the past ten years, which encouraged all service personnel and people to building a thriving country.
					
					 Writers of the April 15 Literary Production Company, Korean Scriptwriting Company and other companies created cycles of novels "Immortal History", "Immortal Guidance" and "On Road of Loyalty" which adapted the revolutionary history of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu into novel. The works instilled the revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great men into the service personnel and people and aroused them to a new great surge.
					
					Full and medium-length novels, poems and songs, scenarios of feature films "A Schoolgirl's Diary" and "Pyongyang Nalpharam", dramatic literature "We Will Recollect Today" and other works are associated with the efforts of creators who devoted themselves to creating the Songun revolutionary literature.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea created book "Collection of Legends on Kumsusan Memorial Palace" (3), collection of works "The Sun of Songun Is Everlasting" and other works, more than 30 000 in all.
					
					 Political essays "Let Us Meet at Square of Victory", "'An Echo among Hills Shakes the Era" and other editorials, articles and commentaries are associated with efforts of media persons to become genuine Songun revolutionary comrades sharing idea and intention with the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Journalists and other media persons walked the road along steep Chol Pass and Mt. Osong covered with snow to write stories and went to worksites for a great surge, demonstrating the political and ideological might of the Juche-based media and positively contributing to arming the party members and other people with the spirit of defending socialism.

articles.title: "The Voice of the Mother", Song in Praise of WPK
articles.content:
"The Voice of the Mother", Song in Praise of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- "The Voice of the Mother", a song created in Juche 81 (1992), is nowadays popular among the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The song speaks highly of the Workers' Party of Korea in comparison with maternalism.
					
					 "It is one of the famous songs the Korean people like to sing out of feelings of profound gratitude and deep trust in the WPK," said Pak Yong Hwa, manager of the Rakwon Taesong Shop under the Taesong Guidance Bureau.
					
					 She continued:
					
					 "It is feelings and practices of mother to devote everything to her children and even risk her life for them.
					
					 Mother's care for her children is wholehearted and lovely. Therefore, even the grown-ups think of their mothers before anybody else in joyful or sorrowful time.
					
					 The WPK looks after all the people in the country with the same feelings of love and affection as mother has for her children. Such love reaches to everyone, disregarding his or her career or past wrongdoing."
					
					 Pak Kyong Hui, a woman living in Kyonghung-dong, Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "A mother's love is generally for her own children, but the WPK's care reaches to all the people throughout the country. This loving care is a source of strength and courage for the people.
					
					 As the song says, the WPK's leadership, fraught with love and trust, encourages the people to work great feats in production and construction."

articles.title: True Colors of Peace Wreckers Can Not Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
True Colors of Peace Wreckers Can Not Be Concealed: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea can not conceal the true colors as the arch criminal who has violated the peace on the Korean Peninsula and gravely threatened the life and security of the nation in the whole period of its office, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a bylined article.
					 The five years of its office are crowded with the crimes the group committed by escalating confrontation between the north and the south and increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, seized with extreme enmity toward fellow countrymen, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Upon coming to power, the group came out with a confrontation policy contrary to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation. It frantically kicked up military rackets in a sinister attempt to do harm to the DPRK by force of arms, escalating tension on the peninsula.
					
					 The main aim of these confrontation rackets was to ignite a new war. The anti-DPRK "sanctions" racket kicked up by the Lee group in league with foreign forces under the pretext of the DPRK's satellite launch is a dangerous provocation to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The group showed extra zeal in getting the UNSC fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" by terming the DPRK's satellite launch a "long-range missile launch" in an attempt to justify its scenario for developing ballistic missiles and push forward it in real earnest.
					
					 It was a just step for self-defence that the army and people of the DPRK turned out as one in an all-out action to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation in order to cope with the prevailing situation.
					
					 This action will be intensified till it shatters the reckless provocations of the U.S., the Lee group and other hostile forces and their moves for a war of aggression, achieves durable peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and accomplishes the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: DPRK Not Be Bound to Any "Resolution" of UNSC: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Not Be Bound to Any "Resolution" of UNSC: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The UNSC adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, terming its satellite launch "a launch of ballistic missile," an application of the most despicable and deceptive double standards.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a bylined article. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The "resolution" was cooked up with the U.S. playing a main role and member nations of the UNSC supporting its proposal. It calls for hostile measures for tightening "sanctions" against the DPRK in a bid to ban its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and block its economic development and the bolstering up of its military capability.
					
					 Looking back on history, the UNSC has never discussed the launch of scientific and technological satellite by a country as an agenda item "threatening world peace and security" and adopted "a resolution on sanctions" in nearly 70 years of its existence. Those countries which claim to be big powers tested intercontinental ballistic missiles in the eyes of the world during the Cold War and the post Cold War, in particular, but the UNSC had never put the issue on the table and discussed it. However, it is taking issue with the DPRK only. Moreover, it fabricated an entirely unreasonable "resolution" over the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Had the member states of the UNSC handled our issue of satellite launch with objectivity and fairness, they would not have done such a shameful thing as allowing their dignity to be trampled down and the mission of the UNSC ignored and let loose such self-contradictory remarks that it was "a measure taken against the violation of the resolution adopted in the past".
					
					 There are among the member states of the UNSC countries which used to stand up against the U.S.'s application of hegemonic double standards in the past.
					
					 Their recent behavior indicated that those countries say No when they consider those double standards as harmful to their own interests, but, if not, they do not care much about them and, moreover, they even blindly follow the U.S. in pursuit of their own interests.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers are sadly mistaken if they miscalculate the DPRK would accept the entirely unreasonable "resolution".
					
					 The DPRK will never be bound to any "resolution".
					
					 The U.S. and its followers will clearly witness the adverse consequences to be entailed by the application of the double standards.

articles.title: S. Korean Confrontation Maniac's Remarks Battered by Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Confrontation Maniac's Remarks Battered by Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Chon Yong U, chief of Diplomacy and Security in Chongwadae of south Korea, said that "the north would lend an ear" if tighter "sanctions" are imposed, while taking issue with its step for bolstering the deterrence. He said that the "core of denuclearization" is to break the north's "illusion" about nuclear weapons. He even let loose such coarse invectives that the "best way" is to tighten "sanctions" so as to be unbearable by the north. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The reckless remarks of Chon go to prove that when one is obsessed with confrontation with fellow countrymen, he can not but have a foolish dream. 
					
					 Chon, failing to properly face up to the present situation, is dreaming a daydream while talking about "minimum of sanctions" and "breaking illusion". His despicable behavior invites derision from the Korean people. 
					
					 It is the reflection of the foolish ambition of the south Korean confrontation maniacs. No "sanctions" on earth can check the DPRK dynamically advancing upholding the banner of Songun in the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space. 
					
					 The DPRK will regard "sanctions" as the declaration of a war. The anti-DPRK campaign for tightening "sanctions" being stepped up by the Lee Myung Bak group will bring catastrophic consequences. 
					
					 Such confrontation maniacs as Lee Myung Bak and Chon Yong U are running amuck to blatantly challenge the DPRK's just cause of defending sovereignty. They should be mindful that they will have to pay dearly for their hideous acts of treachery.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Joint Marine Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Joint Marine Exercises 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers plan to stage joint marine exercises in the East Sea of Korea from February 4 to 6, according to the south Korean MBC. 
					 It is said that the U.S. nuclear-powered submarine San Francisco, Aegis cruiser Shiloh and south Korean Aegis destroyer and other warships would be involved in the war exercises. 
					
					 The warmongers openly said that the "exercises would assume the nature of demonstrating armed forces against the north". They are contemplating staging marine tactical and mobile exercises including anti-submarine drill to cope with the north's submarine infiltration. 
					
					 They are going busy with dangerous war exercises against the DPRK, while kicking up a racket for "sanctions" against it over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: U.S. Warships Enter S. Korean Ports
articles.content:
U.S. Warships Enter S. Korean Ports
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. nuclear-powered submarine San Francisco and Aegis cruiser Shiloh entered Jinhae Port and Pusan Port in South Kyongsang Province of south Korea, according to south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 A man concerned of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea clarified this on Friday. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists introduced into south Korea these warships carrying nuclear attack means to let them take part in the U.S.-south Korea joint anti-submarine exercise for a preemptive attack on the DPRK slated to take place in the East Sea of Korea next week. 
					
					 It is reported that a nuclear-powered carrier under the U.S. 7th Fleet will soon arrive in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Warn Authorities Not to Take Part in "Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Warn Authorities Not to Take Part in "Sanctions" against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Organizations of people of different social standings of south Korea warned the puppet authorities not to take part in the "sanctions" against the DPRK at a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 31, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. They included the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					 The organizations said that the authorities would meet consequences beyond imagination if they take part in the UN "sanctions" or opt to impose "independent sanctions".

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's "Special Pardon" Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's "Special Pardon" Condemned in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society on Jan. 29 released a commentary denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak for granting his close confidants and family members "special pardon".
					 Lee granted his confidants and family members of his daughter (son)-in-law who were subject to punishment for their irregularities and corruption "special pardon" despite the strong public denunciation, the commentary said. This will be recorded as the worst crime in history as it is aimed to seek his interests only, the commentary charged.

articles.title: S. Korean Figure Slams Police's Illegal Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Figure Slams Police's Illegal Suppression
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea, laid bare the police's illegal suppression on Jan. 28.
					 She noted that the Seoul District Police Agency has secretly watched her through homepage in 2011, while regularly looking into her private information record after the year 2007.
					
					 The police committed such an action with no approval and without making notification of the search operation, she said, adding:
					
					 The police's search operation was the secret investigation to charge that the organization's activities supporting the Korean schools in Japan were in violation of the "Security Law".

articles.title: Koreans in China Denounce UN Security Council's Anti-DPRK "Resolution"
articles.content:
Koreans in China Denounce UN Security Council's Anti-DPRK "Resolution"
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting of branches under the Yanbian Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Yanbian Regional Youth Committee of the Youth Federation of Korean Nationals in China was held in Yanji City, Jilin Province, China on Jan. 28 to denounce the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 Read out at the meeting was a statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					
					 The speakers at the meeting said that the "resolution" which the U.S. and its allies endorsed at the UN Security Council to find fault with the DPRK's satellite launch, the nation's great auspicious event, is peppered with hostile measures to ban the satellite launch for peaceful purposes and deter it from developing economy and bolstering national defence capabilities.
					
					 The gangster-like logic of banning only the DPRK's satellite launch is the height of hostile policy toward the DPRK and the moves for confrontation with it, they said.
					
					 What is more enraging is that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors worked hard as a shock brigade in the fabrication of the "resolution on sanctions", far from welcoming the launch as a great auspicious event of the nation, they noted.
					
					 Those keen on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen with their backs turned on the nation will meet nothing but a miserable end, they added.
					
					 The Koreans in China will join the people in the homeland in their all-out action to foil all the moves to stifle the DPRK on the part of all the hostile forces including the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, in hearty response to the statement of the DPRK NDC, they vowed.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Heading for Military Giant
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Heading for Military Giant
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Jo Kuk Je, director of the Secretariat of the General Association of Koreans in China, on Jan. 24 released a statement titled "Let's heighten vigilance against Japan's dangerous moves for military giant".
					 Japan is becoming evermore undisguised in its moves to turn itself into a military giant, the statement said, adding: This is evidenced by the fact  that in the draft budget for 2013 the Japanese government decided to drastically increase military expenditure and announced it would reexamine its military strategy confined to its "defense".
					
					 This is aimed to provide a legal and financial guarantee for emerging a military giant and launching overseas expansion, it noted.
					
					 The moves of the Japanese reactionaries to distort the past history of aggression and turn Japan into a military giant have reached a dangerous phase, it said, and went on:
					
					 No matter how hard one works to distort history, one cannot change it.
					
					 For Japan to head for a military giant, oblivious of its past lesson, is as foolish an act as precipitating its doom.
					
					 If Japan keeps rushing headlong into a military giant, defying the warning of the international community, it will meet only a miserable destruction. The Japanese reactionaries had better stop acting rashly.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked by Syrian Political Party
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked by Syrian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria was formed on Jan. 28 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Adnan Ismail, deputy general secretary of the Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and the leadership traits of the dear respected Kim Jong Un in diverse forms and ways as part of the commemoration of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Poland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Poland
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Polish preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on Jan. 26.
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il in such events as a seminar, remembrance meeting, lecture and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Finland
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Finnish preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 28.
					 Personages of political parties and social bodies including Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finnish Mangyongdae Committee and the Finland-Korea Society, were elected co-chairpersons of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to give wide publicity to the undying feats of Kim Jong Il and his personality as a great man and noble traits, and organize colorful celebrations on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Italy 
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Rome on Jan. 28.
					 Alfonso Galdi, director of the International Department of the Leftwing People's Party of Communists of Italy, and Constanzi Franco, secretary general of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Pakistan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Pakistan
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of Shining Star) was formed in Karachi on January 26.
					 The general secretary of the Sind Provincial Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party and Shahida Wijarat, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to mark the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Pakistani Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Pakistani Figures
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Pakistani figures highly praised leader Kim Jong Il's exploits at the inaugural ceremony of the Pakistani preparatory committee to mark his birth anniversary held in Karachi on January 26.
					 The general secretary of the Sind Provincial Committee of the Pakistan Awami National Party paid high tribute to Kim Jong Il and referred to the fact that he devoted his life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Shahida Wijarat, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, and Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, said that the birth of Kim Jong Il was a historic event, adding that humankind would admire him eternally.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in South Africa
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in South Africa
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A South African preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Mfumalanga Province on January 28.
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including seminar, lecture, reading session, photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 A message of greeting to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Events have taken place held in different countries to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a meeting by the Poland-Korea Association, a seminar by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa of Democratic Congo and a lecture and film show by the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the period between January 23 and 25.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association said Kim Jong Il led the Korean people to victory and glory with his iron will, brilliant wisdom and wise leadership.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people would surely build a thriving nation without fail as they are under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, successor to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa of Democratic Congo said that the DPRK has demonstrated its might as political, ideological and military power before the whole world.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK could make great achievements, being called as a country of independence and Juche, as they were led by Kim Jong Il, master of ideology and theory.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il's works serve as precious heritage of humankind and a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon to defend justice and truth.
					
					 He stated that the great idea and exploits of Kim Jong Il would be handed down to posterity.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in a lecture referred to the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for realizing the human cause of independence and highly praised him as a world elder statesman and peerlessly great man.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Poland.

articles.title: Events for Celebrating Day of Shining Star Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
Events for Celebrating Day of Shining Star Held in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting, round-table talks and an opening ceremony of a ten-day photo exhibition took place in Nigeria on Jan. 25 and 28 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos on the feats of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the proud successes made by the army and the people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation including successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association who doubles as chairman of the Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, said that he performed precious feats for the Korean people and the world people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il, enjoys absolute support and trust not only from the Korean people but from the progressives of the world.
					
					 The director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory said that Kim Jong Il was the tender-hearted father of the people who devoted his whole life to them and he would always be with Nigerians.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on January 23 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The UNSC adopted a "resolution" finding fault with the DPRK's satellite launch under the pressure of the U.S.
					
					 The hostile moves of the U.S. imperialists and their allies are an aggressive act aimed at checking the DPRK's development of space for peaceful purposes and economic development through "sanctions".
					
					 They also seek to strangle the DPRK's economy and topple its socialist system.
					
					 The recent "resolution" against the DPRK was the height of double standards. The member states of the UNSC have no qualifications to stop the DPRK's satellite launch and self-defensive measures.
					
					 The DPRK would remain undeterred by the arrogant and shameless "resolution" of the UNSC.
					
					 The statement specified the principled stand clarified by the DPRK and expressed the belief that socialist Korea would victoriously frustrate the aggressive moves of the imperialists and reactionaries by the great Songun politics being carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported in Belarus, Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported in Belarus, Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Belarusian and Nigerian political parties and organizations issued statements in support of the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry.
					 Five political parties and organizations including the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus, Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus and  Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named After Kim Il Sung in a joint statement on Jan. 26 said:
					
					 The UNSC adopted an illegal "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch.
					
					 This clearly proved once again that the UNSC was completely turned into a servant of imperialism.
					
					 The U.S. ignited a war of aggression against the Korean people in the 1950s of the last century and suffered defeat. Nevertheless, it is still working hard to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Keeping its aggressor forces equipped with nuclear weapons in south Korea, the U.S. is still refusing to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 It is an inviolable right of the DPRK to explore the road of scientific and technological advance including the conquering of space like other sovereign states.
					
					 We denounce the UNSC's "resolution" and fully support the DPRK's stand that the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is possible only when the world is completely denuclearized.
					
					 The Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy in a statement on Jan. 24 said that all the steps taken by the DPRK are entirely just, adding that the group would extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people all out in a sacred struggle for justice.

articles.title: UN "Resolution" against DPRK Blasted by Figure of International Organization
articles.content:
UN "Resolution" against DPRK Blasted by Figure of International Organization 
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, issued a statement on Jan. 25 denouncing the UNSC for fabricating "a resolution" against the DPRK at the U.S. prodding. 
					 He said:
					
					 The UNSC cooked up a provocative and unreasonable "resolution" at the instigation of the U.S. in wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. This is an expression of unilateral and double-standard policy of the UNSC.
					
					 The fabrication of the unreasonable UN "resolution" is a provocation intended to wreck the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the region and an aggressive move to obstruct the dialogue for denuclearization at any cost.
					
					 I fully support the statements of the DPRK National Defence Commission and its Foreign Ministry.
					
					 I, at the same time, strongly denounce the provocative and unreasonable "resolution" adopted at the UNSC which was turned into a tool of the U.S. in its persistent pursuance of a hostile policy of aggression against socialist Korea.
					
					 All the progressive and peace-loving forces of the world are called upon to intensify solidarity activities to make voices demanding the U.S. defuse the daily escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula as early possible and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK ring louder on the earth.

articles.title: Bulgarian Political Figure Urges U.S. and Its Allies to Make Apology to DPRK
articles.content:
Bulgarian Political Figure Urges U.S. and Its Allies to Make Apology to DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on Jan. 26 blasting the U.S. and its allies for fabricating the UNSC's "resolution".
					 He said:
					
					 Progressive humankind is greatly angered by the UNSC's fabrication of a "resolution on sanctions" which took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is the publicly recognized fact that the use of ballistic missile technology is the only method of launching a satellite. The U.S., however, termed the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes a "long-range missile launch" and "wanton violation" of the UN "resolution". This is a revelation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Those countries who launched more satellites than any other countries are asserting that the DPRK's satellite launch poses a problem as "it used ballistic missile technology". This is the height of self-deception and double standards.
					
					 He strongly denounced the U.S. and its allies' provocative act of wantonly violating the sovereignty of the DPRK by denying the right to use space for peaceful purposes recognized by the universally accepted international law.
					
					 They should make an apology for their wrongdoings which violated the sovereignty of the DPRK and withdraw at once all the unreasonable "resolutions".

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Praises Kim Jong Il as Father of Korean Nation
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Praises Kim Jong Il as Father of Korean Nation
						
 Pyongyang, February 2 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il on Jan. 23 posted articles on the websites of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea with his photo.
					 The articles said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the revolutionary solider spirit was fully displayed across the country and wisely led the struggle to overcome serious difficulties with Jagang Province as an example.
					
					 Shining miracles and innovations were made in every part of the DPRK under his leadership.
					
					 The Korean people led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un have glorified the great Songun era while foiling all kinds of the imperialists and reactionaries' moves.
					
					 On the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il), the progressive humankind look back upon the brilliant life of Kim Jong Il who devoted everything to the reconciliation and unity of the Korean nation.
					
					 The articles introduced in detail his immortal feats for national reunification.
					
					 The articles praised him as the father of the Korean nation.
					
					 They noted that Kim Jong Un has energetically led the struggle to successfully carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en IV Conferencia de Secretarios de celula del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en IV Conferencia de Secretarios de celula del PTC
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tomo una foto de recuerdo con los participantes en la IV  Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El respondio a las calurosas aclamaciones de los participantes en el conclave y dio su saludo cordial a los secretarios de celula de todo el partido que dedican esfuerzos abnegados por el fortalecimiento del partido y la prosperidad de la patria con el honor de funcionarios del partido de base.
					
					  La IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del PTC se registrara en la historia de nuestro partido como un conclave en que se preparo un importante jalon en fortalecer por todos los medios la capacidad combativa del partido de acuerdo con la demanda de la nueva epoca historica del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y lograr la victoria final en la construccion de un Estado prospero, dijo, felicito calurosamente a los participantes en la reunion que finalizaron con exito sus trabajos con elevado entusiasmo y tomo la foto de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					  Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los participantes en el conclave y los secretarios de celula de todo el partido, que han avanzado a pasos firmes por la unica senda de la revolucion siguiendo al partido, cumpliran con toda su mision revolucionaria en la sagrada lucha por adelantar el futuro de la prosperidad uniendose compactamente en torno al Comite Central del PTC.
					
					  Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ri Pyong Sam y Jo Yon Jun.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX denuncia EE.UU. que ampara lanzamiento de satelite de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX denuncia EE.UU. que ampara lanzamiento de satelite de Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que ya quedaron reveladas la pauta de doble rasero y la naturaleza bandidesca de Estados Unidos que niega el derecho a lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio a la pregunta formulada el dia 2 por la ACNC como sigue:
					Recientemente, EE.UU. instigo a aprobar la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que cuestiona injustamente el lanzamiento de satelite no.2 de "Kwangmyongsong-3" de la RPDC, mientras amparo el lanzamiento de satelite "Naro" del Sur de Corea, lo que provoca la denuncia y la burla de la sociedad internacional.
					
					El vocero del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. dijo descaradamente que "el Sur de Corea vino realizando con responsabilidad el plan de lanzamiento espacial y aclara que no tiene la intencion militar en esta materia, razon por la cual es totalmente diferente al modo del Norte de Corea".
					
					Es el climax de la pauta de doble rasero y el caracter descarado el hecho de que el imperio niega sin base alguna el derecho a lanzar el satelite de la RPDC, en tanto abriga a ciegas el lanzamiento de satelite del Sur de Corea.
					
					El lanzamiento exitoso de la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3" es el ejercicio del legitimo derecho del Estado soberano conveniente a la ley internacional universal y lo reconocieron la sociedad internacional y hasta los organos especialistas norteamericanos. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. cometio el acto hostil negando el derecho legitimo e independiente de la RPDC al lanzamiento del satelite, lo cual evidencia que ese imperio intento desde el principio utilizar el lanzamiento de dicho satelite como un nuevo motivo de su campana de aplastamiento anti-RPDC. 
					
					Las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que EE.UU. presenta a menudo como pretexto para negar el derecho de la RPDC al lanzamiento de satelite son injustas desde su aprobacion. 
					
					Infringiendo el principio fundamental de la Carta de la ONU de respetar la soberania de cada pais y asegurar la imparcialidad y hasta los derechos internacionales universales que reflejan la unanime voluntad de la sociedad internacional, EE.UU. impuso de manera forzosa su politica hostil de impedir la investigacion de la ciencia universal y el desarrollo economico de la RPDC. 
					
					Al valerse de todos los medios y metodos para aplastar a la RPDC, EE.UU. destruyo el ano pasado el sistema de no proliferacion de misiles establecido por si mismo y alargo el alcance de tiro de misiles del Sur de Corea, agravando asi la tension de la region. 
					
					En el mundo actual existe la ley de la selva y se tolera la doctrina gangsteril de EE.UU., segun la cual su lacayo puede hacer todo lo deseado, pero los paises hostilizados por si mismo no pueden hacer nada. 
					
					El modo de pensamiento y la pauta al estilo yanqui pueden ser aceptados a otros paises, pero no pueden surtir efecto jamas para la RPDC. 
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC entraron en el enfrentamiento total para defender la dignidad de la nacion y la soberania del pais. 
					
					La cinica pauta de doble rasero y los brutales actos hostiles de EE.UU. no podran evadir las contramedidas intransigentes de la RPDC.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia campana anti-RPDC de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia campana anti-RPDC de banda de Lee Myung Bak
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 2 la informacion no. 1019 que sigue:
					Atemorizada ante las declaraciones resueltas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre las medidas hostiles que abusaron la ONU, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos se recurre desesperadamente al alboroto de "sancion" en contubernio con su amo norteamericano.
					
					El 31 de enero, el traidor Lee Myung Bak aparecio en la urgente reunion de los ministros de diplomacia y seguridad donde hablo tanto de la "sancion mas fuerte" y "contramedida" frente a la "prueba nuclear y otra provocacion adicional del Norte de Corea". Tambien el ministro de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin, el presidente del Servicio de Inteligencia Won Se Hun y otros titeres estuvieron acorde con tales palabras provocativas de Lee.
					
					Por otra parte, el jefe de diplomacia y seguridad de Chongwadae, Chon Yong U, el ministro de Unificacion, Ryu U Ik, y otros maniacos conflictivos dijeron que el "Norte de Corea debe escoger una de entre la existencia y el arma nuclear" y que "hay que aplicarle la sancion mas intensiva dificil de cumplirse.
					
					E incluso los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos hablan hasta de "sancion" militar, mientras se concentran en el Sur de Corea y contornos de la Peninsula Coreana los armamentos belicos ultramodernos. El submarino nuclear y el buque crucero Aegis de EE.UU. intentan anclar en el Sur de Corea para "demostrar la fuerza militar" haciendo el entrenamiento conjunto en el mar junto con los titeres surcoreanos. Ademas, el ejercito surcoreano ha entrado en el "estado de alerta sobre el Norte" y los belicistas fomentan la psicosis de guerra en las unidades en la primera linea de frente del ejercito titere. 
					
					Insatisfecha de haber fabricado en la delantera la injusta "resolucion" de la ONU contra la parte connacional, la banda de Lee recrudece su campana conflictiva y belica contra la RPDC calificando atrevidamente de "provocacion adicional" la contramedida tomada por esa ultima para la defensa de su sagrada soberania. Este hecho deja conocer claramente que esos tipejos son bribones de peor calana que hasta el ultimo momento de su vida, buscan el arruinamiento de la nacion en cooperacion con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					La presente campana de la camarilla de Lee persigue el malsano objetivo de recuperar con la ayuda de su amo gringo su honra caida al suelo, empeorar de manera irrecuperable las relaciones intercoreanas al llevar al extremo la situacion y entregar al proximo "poder" el testigo de "sancion" y enfrentamiento. 
					
					La cada dia mas grave campana anti-RPDC de las fuerzas hostiles, inclusive EE.UU. y la horda surcoreana, comprueba que la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU es producto del complot para ampliar de manera escalonada las medidas hostiles a la RPDC, impedir la construccion de potencia economica por via pacifica de ella y aislarla y aplastarla finalmente.
					
					Pero esto es una gran equivocacion.
					
					La campana de "sancion" de los enemigos hizo mil veces mas fuertes la decision y la voluntad de todos los militares y civiles coreanos de defender su causa justa bajo la bandera de justicia y construir la mejor potencia del mundo y un Estado civilizado socialista.
					
					La "sancion", que quiere aplicar la banda titere surcoreana en contubernio con EE.UU. y Japon, deviene un acto ridiculo y suicida igual a meterse al fuego con la gasolina.
					
					La RPDC ha declarado ya solemnemente su posicion superdura frente a las brutales medidas hostiles de los enemigos y todo el ejercito y pueblo de ella estan esperando el momento de la ultima batalla de vida o muerte manteniendose en la perfecta disposicion.
					
					La RPDC esta preparada fuertemente tanto a la "sancion" economica como a la militar.  Y si alguien atenta, aunque sea en lo minimo, la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC mediante la "sancion" de cualquier tipo, no podra evitar el fuego de venganza terrible.
					
					La camarilla surcoreana debe tener presente que tomar parte en la "sancion" contra la RPDC desatara la gran e historica guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La justa causa de la RPDC es invencible y no existe en este mundo el que pueda frenarla.
					
					La banda surcoreana debe actuar con prudencia recordando como ha transcurrido la enconada historia de enfrentamiento RPDC-EE.UU. que prosigue de siglo en siglo.

articles.title: Se efectuo cursillo de participantes en conferencia de secretarios de celula de partido
articles.content:
Se efectuo cursillo de participantes en conferencia de secretarios de celula de partido
						
Pyongyang, 2 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 29 de enero al primero de febrero el cursillo para los participantes en la IV Conferencia de los Secretarios de Celula del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim y Choe Ryong Hae, miembros del Buro Politico, secretarios del CC del PTC y otros funcionarios de esta organizacion politica y los participantes en dicha reunion.
					
					En la ocasion fueron abordados los deberes de  celula del partido en desempenar su papel siendo unidad basica en defender a ultranza al lider, materializarlos cabalmente y enlazar el partido con las masas populares en pleno acato a las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su historico discurso en la conferencia y los medios para cumplirlas.
					
					Quedo mencionada la importancia de las tareas asumidas ante las celulas partidistas en  infundir a los secretarios de celula del partido las inmortales hazanas de los Generalisimos logradas en la construccion del partido y fortalecerlo de modo organizativo-ideologico.
					
					Se refirieron a las medidas para dar a conocer los exitos logrados en las labores de las celulas y sus secretarios, generalizar sus experiencias y superar las desviaciones.
					
					Tambien fue discutido el contenido principal del discurso del Mariscal Kim Jong Un "Elevemos por todos los medios el poderio combativo del partido y aceleremos energicamente la construccion de un Estado prospero mejorando y fortaleciendo la labor de celula del partido" pronunciado en la conferencia.
					
					Se refirio a que enaltecer con sinceridad al Mariscal Kim Jong Un es el sagrado deber y obligacion de los soldados revolucionarios.
					
					Se dio enfasis a la necesidad de transmitir para siempre las hazanas de los grandes hombres sin pares del monte Paektu acumuladas para el fortalecimiento de las celulas partidistas y de convertirlas en las firmes organizaciones combativas.
					
					Se discutieron los temas de realizar sustancialmente la labor ideologica y educativa para poner de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de los militantes del partido y los trabajadores, agrupar compactamente en torno al partido a  las masas haciendo bien la labor con sus alma  conforme a la politica de amor al pueblo del Mariscal y acelerar la construccion de un Estado prospero materializando el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il.
